name: Pong (itch) (Joker Gaming from Game Gen)
description:
This is my 2nd game I made on Game Gen from the lesson I really like how it looks and how it turns out too.

This game only has 3 points and players can have fun with it but watch out there's a twist not only this is a pong game but it has an 2nd ball and obstacles that are in the way. Good Luck playing versus in this game!

The controls and mobile controls are simple 

Player 1: W=Up S=Down (mobile: tap and hold left=up tap and hold bottom left=down)

Player 2: Up arrow=Up Down arrow=Down (mobile: tap and hold tap right=up tap and hold bottom right=down)

Good luck and have fun with this game
